review_title: Intern: Nice perks, but that great company to work for
pros: As an intern you can learn a lot, specially in my case because I had to build from the ground up the Marketing department for one of the sucursals
cons: The higher management are very conservative when it comes to new ideas for the improvement of the business and the way how things work
